Name: Simple FPS Aim Trainer
About the game: Fast and Lightweight Fast to load and easy to run on low-end machines. Leave it running in the background and the program will automatically pause resource usage when tabbed out User Friendly Designed to be user friendly and easy to understand at a glance, all the training options are visually sorted for ease of use. Experimental Calibration Mode New to FPS on PC? Coming from console? Try out the Calibration Mode to find a beginner mouse sensitivity that suits you. Drag and Drop Target Controls If you can aim at targets you can control where they spawn! Simply drag and drop to resize and move spawn areas around the arena to control where your targets spawn. Custom Workshop Content and Leaderboards Create your own scenarios or enjoy those made by others and compete for hi-scores on the community leaderboards
